sources.title: The Frog Pond (1938)
sources.description: In Ub Iwerks' The Frog Pond, many frogs are singing and having a good time until a big bully frog takes some food and basically orders a house built on his lily pond. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-frog-pond-1938/

metadata.Plot: The tranquility and happiness of a community of singing and dancing frogs is upset when an aggressive toad shows up, and before long he is demanding that the frogs build him a house and throw him a "welcoming" party. Matters come to a head when the frogs decide that they've had enough of this bully and make plans to "dethrone" him.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Billy Bletcher, Pinto Colvig
